algorithm_technique: number theory (divisibility) and precomputation with a lookup table
problem_summary_simple: Assign elements to groups based on divisibility, prioritizing smaller element indices.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a lookup table to store the smallest index of an element divisible by a group size, iterating through multiples.
key_insights: The constraint of assigning the smallest index element is key.
Pre-calculating assignments for each possible group size up to the maximum group size is efficient.
Iterating through multiples of each element (y = x, 2x, 3x, ...) allows for quick population of the lookup table.
